info.name: RealState API - COMPLETE Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for RealState application - ALL endpoints including Authentication, Users, Owners, Clients, Concierges, Properties, Property Media, Features, Facilities, Contracts, Payments, Reminders, Emails, Role Permissions, User Permissions, and Google Calendar

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT token (auto-saved).
Login with nickname and password. Returns JWT token (auto-saved). You can use either email OR nickname (not both).
Request password reset. Sends reset token to email.
Reset password using token from email (forgot password flow). Token comes from email after calling /forgotPassword.
Change password when logged in. Requires current password, new password, and confirmation.

query.description: Search in firstName, lastName, email, role
Filter by role: admin, manager, agent, broker, guest

formdata.description: Required: admin, manager, agent, broker, guest

request.description: Create new user. Required: firstName, lastName, email, role. Optional: nickname, password, contactNumber, AlternativePhone, photo. Sends welcome email.
Soft delete (marks as deleted, doesn't remove from DB)
Ban user (marks as banned)
Hard delete (permanently removes user)

query.description: Search in firstName, lastName, email, contactNumber

request.description: CSV format: firstName,lastName,email,contactNumber,alternativePhone,dateOfBirth,notes
For buildings: listingType, location, size are OPTIONAL
Update property status (active/inactive)

body.raw:
{
  "propertyId": "PROPERTY_ID_HERE",
  "elevator": true,
  "electricity": true,
  "parking": 2,
  "visitorParking": 5,
  "gym": true,
  "pool": true,
  "sauna": false,
  "kidsArea": true,
  "garden": false,
  "executiveLounge": true,
  "fullTimeConcierge": true,
  "fullTimeSecurity": true,
  "otherFacilities": ["Rooftop Terrace", "BBQ Area"]
}

request.description: Create contract. Required: contractNumber, propertyId, startDate, endDate, amount. Optional: currency (USD/EUR/LBP), realOwner, realClient, realConcierge, ownerName, ownerPhone, clientName, clientPhone, document, notes.
Get payment history/audit trail
Export all payments as PDF
Create payment. At least one of: username, userEmail, ownerName, realOwner, realClient, or realConcierge is required. Payment methods: CASH, BANK_TRANSFER, BINANCE, OTHER.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Property Showing",
  "description": "Show apartment to potential client",
  "date": "2024-12-25",
  "time": "14:30",
  "category": "Property Showing",
  "priority": "high",
  "notes": "Client is very interested"
}

request.description: Categories: Property Showing, Client Follow-up, Meeting, Deadline, Others. Priority: low, medium, high
Send email to one or multiple recipients
Send email to user by email, nickname, or user ID
Resources: properties, contracts, users, payments, features, facilities, media, reminders. Actions: read, create, update, delete
Get Google OAuth URL (Admin only). Redirect user to authUrl.
OAuth callback (handled by Google redirect, no auth required)
Check if Google Calendar is connected
Disconnect Google Calendar (Admin only)
